name: MPES - Nav Float
description: Description : Mengubah tampilan top-navigation-link forum IDWS dan membuatnya menempel di pojok kanan atas browser. Kunjungi juga MilkyPartyEleganStyle Part 1 & Part 2 untuk mengubah total tampilan forum IDWS. For more information about this style, please visit our Thread
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://forum.indowebster.com") {  div#toplinks { right: 0px !important; z-index:1000 !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser{ background: rgb(200, 200, 200) !important; width: 166px !important; height: 20px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser:after { content: ' ' !important; display: block !important; position: fixed !important; right: 0 !important; width: 164px !important; height: 20px !important; z-index: 100 !important; background: rgb(200, 200, 200) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li{ padding: 0px !important; font-size:0px !important; line-height:0px !important; height: auto !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li.welcomelink { padding: 0px !important; position: absolute !important; right: 165px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li.welcomelink > a{ padding-top: 0px !important; padding-bottom: 0px !important; padding-left: 10px !important; padding-right: 7px !important; display: inline-block !important; color: #000 !important; background: rgb(200, 200, 200) !important; border-bottom-left-radius: 5px !important; font-size: 12px !important; line-height: 20px !important; font-weight: bold !important; font-family: sans-serif !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink){ top: -14px !important; width: auto !important; height: 30px !important; display: block !important; position: fixed !important; z-index: 200 !important; border-radius: 0px !important; padding:0px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(1){ right: 0px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(2){ right: 40px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(4){ right: 80px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(3){ right: 120px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink) > a { padding:0px !important; background:none !important; width:40px !important; height:34px !important; line-height: inherit !important; border-radius:0px !important; background-repeat: no-repeat !important; background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgb(200, 200, 200) 7px, rgba(255,255,255,0) 0px), -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, rgb(200, 200, 200) 7px, rgba(255,255,255,0) 0px), url(http://i.imgur.com/dlJ65LF.png) !important; background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgb(200, 200, 200) 7px, rgba(255,255,255,0) 0px), -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, rgb(200, 200, 200) 7px, rgba(255,255,255,0) 0px), url(http://i.imgur.com/dlJ65LF.png) !important; -webkit-transition: background-color 0.1s !important; -moz-transition: background-color 0.1s !important; -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s, background-color 0.3s !important; -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.3s, background-color 0.3s !important; -webkit-transform: translatey(0px) !important; -moz-transform: translatey(0px) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink):after { font-size:12px !important; line-height:20px !important; position:absolute !important; padding: 2px 6px !important; background:grey !important; visibility:hidden !important; border-radius:6px !important; white-space:nowrap !important; color: white !important; top:78px !important; right:4px !important; opacity:0 !important; -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.5s, background-color 0.5s, opacity 0.5s, color 0.5s !important; -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.5s, background-color 0.5s, opacity 0.5s, color 0.5s !important; box-shadow: 2px 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) !important; -webkit-transform: translatey(0px) !important; -moz-transform: translatey(0px) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(1):after{ content:'Log Out' !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(3):after{ content:'Profile' !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(2):after{ content:'User Control Panel' !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(4):after{ content:'Notifications' !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(1) > a{ background-color: rgb(175, 0, 0) !important; background-position: 100px 100px, 0px 2px, 5px -420px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(3) > a{ width:44px !important; background-color: rgb(0, 38, 119) !important; background-position: -2px 0px, 0px 2px, 10px -450px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(2) > a{ background-color: rgb(0, 117, 0) !important; background-position: 100px 100px, 0px 2px, 5px -479px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(4) > a{ background-color: #77682A !important; background-position: 100px 100px, 0px 2px, 5px -506px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(1):hover > a{ background-color: rgb(216, 0, 0) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(3):hover > a{ background-color: rgb(0, 66, 204) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(2):hover > a{ background-color: rgb(0, 155, 0) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:nth-child(4):hover > a{ background-color: #9C8D4F !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink):hover:after { -webkit-transform: translatey(-22px) !important; -moz-transform: translatey(-22px) !important; visibility:visible !important; opacity:1 !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink):hover > a{ -webkit-transform: translatey(14px) !important; -moz-transform: translatey(14px) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li.notifications > a { -webkit-transform: translatey(6px) !important; -moz-transform: translatey(6px) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li.notifications > a { background-position: 100px 100px, 0px 2px, 100px 100px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li.notifications .notifications-number { font-size: 16px !important; display: block !important; width: 100% !important; height: 100% !important; text-align: center !important; line-height: 30px !important; border-radius: 6px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li.notifications .notifications-number > strong { color: #867738 !important; padding: 0px 4px !important; border-radius: 4px !important; background: white !important; font-family: calibri !important; } div#toplinks > ul.isuser .notifications .popupbody, div#toplinks > ul.isuser .nonotifications .popupbody {position: fixed !important;} div#toplinks ul.nouser { background-color: rgb(80, 80, 80) !important; border-bottom-left-radius: 5px !important; white-space: nowrap !important; float: right !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li:nth-child(1) { margin-right: 230px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li { display: inline-block !important; height: auto !important; width: auto !important; float: right !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li a { background-color: transparent !important; -webkit-transition: color 0.2s !important; -moz-transition: color 0.2s !important; transition: color 0.2s !important; border-radius: 0px !important; padding: 0px 10px !important; line-height: 28px !important; font-weight: bold !important; font-size: 12px !important; height: 28px !important; margin: 0px !important; float: none !important; width: auto !important; display: block !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li a:hover { color: rgb(255, 255, 100) !important; background-color: transparent !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li a[rel="nofollow"] { padding-right: 20px!important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform { margin: 0px !important; width: auto !important; min-width: 0px !important; height: auto !important; float: none !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails { white-space: nowrap !important; border-radius: 0px !important; background: none !important; position: fixed !important; z-index: 200 !important; padding: 0px !important; height: 0px !important; width: auto !important; float: none !important; right: 0px !important; top: 0px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser:after, div#toplinks > ul.nouser:before { display: block !important; content: ' ' !important; width: 242px !important; height: 28px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 0 !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser:before { border-bottom-left-radius: 5px !important; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important; position: fixed !important; z-index: 1 !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser:after { background-color: rgb(80, 80, 80) !important; position: absolute !important; z-index: 2 !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails:after {  } div#toplinks > ul.nouser:hover li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails:after {  } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails input { border-width: 0px !important; border-radius: 0px !important; box-shadow: none !important; font-size: 12px !important; outline: none !important; float: left !important; margin: 0px !important; width: 70px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails .loginbutton { -webkit-transition: color 0.2s !important; -moz-transition: color 0.2s !important; transition: color 0.2s !important; background-color: rgb(80, 80, 80) !important; -webkit-transform: none !important; -moz-transform: none !important; transform: none !important; color: white !important; padding: 0px !important; cursor: pointer !important; font-weight: bold !important; font-family: sans-serif !important; border-color: transparent !important; line-height: 28px !important; height: 28px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails .loginbutton:hover { color: rgb(255, 255, 100) !important; -webkit-transform: none !important; -moz-transform: none !important; transform: none !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails #navbar_username, div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails #navbar_password, div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails #navbar_password_hint { color: rgb(70, 70, 70) !important; line-height: 20px !important; padding: 0px 5px !important; height: 20px !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails #navbar_username { border-right: 2px solid rgb(200, 200, 200) !important; background: rgb(230, 234, 255) !important; } div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails #navbar_password, div#toplinks > ul.nouser li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails #navbar_password_hint{ background: rgb(246, 252, 184) !important; }  div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li, div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink) > a, div#toplinks > ul.isuser > li:not(.welcomelink):after, div#toplinks > ul.nouser:after div#toplinks > ul.nouser > li, div#toplinks > ul.nouser > li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails:after div#toplinks > ul.nouser > li > #navbar_loginform > #logindetails input { backface-visibility: hidden !important; -moz-backface-visibility: hidden !important; -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden !important; } }
